username.description: Username to connect to the Collibra. This user should have privileges to read all the metadata in Collibra.

password.description: Password to connect to the Collibra.

hostPort.title: Host and Port
hostPort.description: Host and port of the Collibra service.

glossaryFilterPattern.title: Glossary Filter Pattern
glossaryFilterPattern.description: Regex to only include/exclude glossaries that match the pattern.

includes.description: List of strings/regex patterns to match and include only database entities that match.

excludes.description: List of strings/regex patterns to match and exclude only database entities that match.

domainFilterPattern.title: Domain Filter Pattern
domainFilterPattern.description: Regex to only include/exclude domains that match the pattern.

includes.description: List of strings/regex patterns to match and include only database entities that match.

excludes.description: List of strings/regex patterns to match and exclude only database entities that match.

enableEnrichment.title: Enable Asset Enrichment
enableEnrichment.description: Enable enrichment of existing OpenMetadata assets with Collibra metadata (descriptions, tags, owners). When enabled, the connector will match Collibra assets to OpenMetadata entities and apply metadata without creating new assets.

connectionOptions.description: Additional connection options to build the URL that can be sent to service during the connection.

connectionArguments.description: Additional connection arguments such as security or protocol configs that can be sent to service during connection.
